title: DHCP Fingerprinting Database
subtitle: Identify devices based on their DHCP fingerprints using Parameter Request List (Option 55) and Vendor Class Identifier (Option 60). Database contains {count} known fingerprints from common devices, operating systems, and IoT equipment.

parameterList.label: Parameter Request List (Option 55)
parameterList.hint: Enter as comma-separated, hex, or space-separated numbers

optionAnalysis.title: Option Analysis
optionAnalysis.unusualDescription: These options may indicate vendor-specific configurations:
optionAnalysis.missingDescription: Options present in the best match but not in your fingerprint:

noMatches.title: No Matches Found
noMatches.description: The provided fingerprint doesn't match any known devices in the database. This could be:

reasons.uncommon: An uncommon device or operating system
reasons.modified: A device with a modified DHCP request list

noMatches.hint: Try adding the Vendor Class Identifier if available.

search.label: Search for Device/OS/Vendor
search.hint: Search the database by device name, OS, or vendor

noResults.title: No Devices Found
noResults.description: No devices matched "{query}". Try a different search term.
